rows.label: qst200224_msg0001
rows.name:
Of course you can become
happy. No matter what kind
of, money is money.

rows.label: qst200224_msg0002
rows.name:
If you have money, you
can solve anything!

rows.label: qst200224_msg0003
rows.name: You are[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst200224_msg0028
rows.name: It's been a while, Glen.

rows.label: qst200224_msg0029
rows.name:
I see[ML:Dash ] So you were the one
who deceived this girl?

rows.label: qst200224_msg0004
rows.name:
Yeah, that's right. But,
I didn't deceive her.

rows.label: qst200224_msg0005
rows.name:
I only advised her to follow
her true feelings obediently.

rows.label: qst200224_msg0006
rows.name:
She will be saved by obtaining
a large amount of money!

rows.label: qst200224_msg0007
rows.name: Money is salvation, you say?

rows.label: qst200224_msg0008
rows.name:
That's right, Glen. You
can't save people with the
justice you speak of.

rows.label: qst200224_msg0009
rows.name: Humans are creatures of desire!

rows.label: qst200224_msg0010
rows.name:
Covered in greed, they calmly
disparage others. This is the
true nature of humans!

rows.label: qst200224_msg0011
rows.name:
Living as one's greed dictates,
fulfilling one's desires, that
is the path to saving people!

rows.label: qst200224_msg0012
rows.name:
Don't screw around! How can something
like that be human salvation!

rows.label: qst200224_msg0013
rows.name:
Even without money, people
can live righteously!

rows.label: qst200224_msg0014
rows.name:
Oops, I don't have time to play
with you. A big event is about
to start in Teos Aure now.

rows.label: qst200224_msg0015
rows.name: Teos Aure, you say? You, what did you[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst200224_msg0016
rows.name:
I gave Fraudrinco to the
monsters around here.

rows.label: qst200224_msg0030
rows.name:
They got 10 times the energy and
started rampaging quite nicely.

rows.label: qst200224_msg0017
rows.name: Eh!? I didn't hear anything about that!

rows.label: qst200224_msg0018
rows.name: Why are you surprised?

rows.label: qst200224_msg0019
rows.name:
It's a chance to advertise the
effects of Fraudrinco, you know?

rows.label: qst200224_msg0020
rows.name:
Outstanding effect even on big monsters!
The numbness-inducing drink Fraudrinco!
Now on sale!! Or something like that.

rows.label: qst200224_msg0021
rows.name:
We can make more and more money. You
wished for that too, didn't you?

rows.label: qst200224_msg0022
rows.name: No way[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst200224_msg0023
rows.name:
You bastard[ML:Dash ] How much
of a fiend are you!

rows.label: qst200224_msg0024
rows.name:
Seems like you can't
suppress your anger, Glen.

rows.label: qst200224_msg0025
rows.name:
But, you don't have time
to be idling around in a
place like this, do you?

rows.label: qst200224_msg0026
rows.name:
By now, Teos Aure is probably
in terrible trouble, you know?

rows.label: qst200224_msg0027
rows.name:
Damn it! I'll settle things with
you later. Don't you run away!
